shorttext: Cove Rest Oil is a terpene-rich indica-dominant oil with strong THC potency and a complex aroma profile.
title: Rest Oil (23-29 mg/ml THC, <1 mg/ml CBD)
description: Rest Oil from Cove is made from an ethanol-free CO2 extraction of an indoor-grown indica-dominant strain formulated with MCT oil. It has strong THC potency, and its rich terpene profile contains myrcene (musky and earthy), beta-caryophyllene (spicy and woodsy), limonene (lemon and lime) and linalool (sweet and citrusy). Rest Oil comes in 20 ml bottles. All oil products sold at OCS.ca are for ingestion only. DO NOT smoke or vape these oils. Use as directed.
